actions.name: Abyssal Tether

cost.trigger: The user hits with and resolves and Physical- or Special-Category Dark Type Attack against a target.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user hits a creature with a Physical- or Special-Category Dark Type Attack.

Effect: The target is @Affliction[bound]. While @Affliction[bound], the target is @Affliction[stunted] and @Affliction[stuck], and has -1 default ATK and SPATK. This @Affliction[bound] effect can only be removed with a Difficult Acrobatics or Running Skill Check.
